decision_conditions: <p><span id="docs-internal-guid-b58a31be-7fff-20a8-b29d-5034e151d917"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">The proposal, by reason of its detailed design, size, and location would infill the rear first floor of the host property, representing an overdominant extension when read in conjunction with the rest of the site. The proposal </span></span><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">would be out of character with the host building and the terrace it forms part of. As such the proposal is contrary to policy </span><span style="background-color: transparent; font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">LP1 (Design Quality and Local Character), </span><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">of the Hackney LP33 Local Plan (2020), policy D4 (</span><span style="background-color: transparent; font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">Delivering good design) </span><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">o</span><span style="background-color: transparent; font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">f the London Plan (2021), and the guidance contained in Hackney's ‘Residential Extensions and Alterations’ SPD (2009).</span></p>
description: Erection of first floor infill extension
